definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: I'd say by far the middle east countries.
sentences.chinese: 我得说这非中东国家莫属。

sentences.english: Throwing shoes at somebody is a supreme insult in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 在中东地区，向人扔鞋子是对人最严重的侮辱。

sentences.english: Monasteries originally developed in the Middle East and Greece form the hermits'buts.
sentences.chinese: 修道院的前身是中东和希腊的隐士隐居的茅舍。

sentences.english: He led a six-nation survey this year on media use in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 今年他在一个中东媒体上对六个国家开启了一次调查。

sentences.english: I consider Vietnamese pho, Middle Eastern shawarmas and all that stuff to be fast food as well.
sentences.chinese: 我认为越南米线，中东烤肉也算是快餐。

sentences.english: Women in the MENA have the right to inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 中东与北非地区的妇女具有遗产继承权。

sentences.english: Tsarist Russia in 1898, when the railway construction in the Middle East, in this set up Sarthou station.
sentences.chinese: 年沙俄修建中东铁路时，在此建立了萨尔图站。

sentences.english: Thiss book focuses on the situation in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 这本书着重谈了中东的形势。

sentences.english: A lot of people here think of Lebanon as the Middle East, as like a war zone.
sentences.chinese: 许多人把黎巴嫩当成中东，就好像一个战区一样。

sentences.english: There are problems in the Middle East and an ongoing war in Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 在中东仍有许多问题等待解决，阿富汗战争还在继续。

sentences.english: Our products are selling to the USA , Europe , the middle-east and etc.
sentences.chinese: 产品远销中东，欧美等国家和地区。

sentences.english: We are discussing Middle-East situation when the professor came into the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 教授走进教室时，我们正讨论中东的形势。

sentences.english: Professor Li will give a series of lectures on the Middle East issue.
sentences.chinese: 李教授将就中东问题作一系列的讲座。

sentences.english: Migration within and out of MENA has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 中东和北非地区之间和之外的移民具有长久的历史。

sentences.english: This method of execution was used in the Middle East, Europe, and parts of Asia.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的中东部和亚洲的一些地方也用这种刑法。

sentences.english: Israelite dare to face all Muslem in Middle East .
sentences.chinese: 以色列人不惧面对所有中东的穆斯林。

definition: nations of the Persian Gulf/Gulf states
